title: Apple iMac
overview: The iMac delivers enhanced performance with powerful Intel Core 2 Duo processors and expanded memory, packed into a beautifully slim and stylish all-in-one design.
details: Powered by Intel Core 2 Duo processors for seamless performance.
Slim, all-in-one design that saves desk space.
Pre-installed with Mac OS X Leopard and iLife '08.
Advanced graphics and high-resolution display for stunning visuals.
Ideal for both creative professionals and everyday users.

specifications.Design: Slim and elegant all-in-one form factor
